full_text:
Shocked to hear about the demise of renowned Bengali Poet Shri Shankha Ghosh.

He has left an indelible mark in the World of Poetry, and it is a big loss for us.

I stand with his family in this hour of grief, and I pray to God that may his soul attain eternal peace.

Om Shanti. https://t.co/g1nuHLPyGA

Moreover, free doorstep delivery of monthly ration to 1.5 Crore households under #Didir10Ongikar will also be initiated. (2/2)

full_text:
সবার জন্য খাদ্য @MamataOfficial - এর অঙ্গীকার। খাদ্য সাথী প্রকল্পের নতুন ব্যবস্থা - এখন আর রেশন দোকানে যাওয়ার দরকার নেই। ১.৫ কোটি পরিবারের দুয়ারে মাসিক রেশন সরবরাহ করা হবে। 

বার্ষিক ৫০টি শহরের ২,৫০০ ‘মা’ ক্যান্টিনে ₹৫ করে ৭৫ কোটি ভর্তুকি যুক্ত আহার। #Didir10Ongikar (1/2) https://t.co/1r9zyCOJui

full_text: Youths are our future and under #Didir10Ongikar we will create 5 Lakh new jobs every year. For the first time ever, a new scheme is being launched, wherein female heads of 1.6 Crore households will benefit from universal monthly income support. (2/2)

full_text:
I extend my wishes to everyone on the auspicious occasion of Hanuman Jayanti. 

May lord give all of us strength to fight all troubles & bless everyone with good health!
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Very, very sad. Shocked. Kajal Sinha, our  candidate from Khardaha, succumbed to Covid.He dedicated his life to serving people & just fought a tireless campaign. He was a long-serving committed member of @AITCofficial. We will miss him. My condolences to his family & his admirers
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
In the wake of upsurge in #COVID19 cases across the country and the ECI Order dated 22nd April, 2021, I am cancelling all my prescheduled meetings and we will reach out to the people virtually.

We will be sharing the updated schedule of the virtual meetings shortly.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
One nation, one party, one leader shouts BJP all the time but to save lives they can’t have one price for vaccine.

Every Indian needs free vaccine, regardless of age, caste, creed, location. GoI must fix ONE price for Covid vaccine irrespective of who pays— Centre or the States.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Shocked and very saddened to hear about the untimely passing away of Ashish, son of @SitaramYechury Ji. My deepest condolences to the grieving family.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Our efforts have been persistent to increase vaccination in the state.
Yesterday, number of doses administered in Kolkata rose to over 39,000 from a daily average of 25,000 vaccinations. GoWB is further ramping up its capacities to ensure vaccination for all eligible citizens.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Just got the news that former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh Ji has tested positive for COVID. Sir, our thoughts and prayers for a speedy and full recovery
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: I have also directed all the top officials to make elaborate arrangements & step up their efforts at every level to deal with #COVID19 situation in WB. The Chief Secretary along with key officials will be doing a Press conference at 2PM to discuss the details of the plan. (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: With the massive surge in #COVID19 cases across India, GoWB is taking all necessary steps to protect its people. I've reached out the PM to help us with additional medicines and vaccines required. (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Amid an ongoing pandemic, we firmly opposed @ECISVEEP's decision to conduct WB polls in 8 phases.

Now, in view of the huge surge in #COVID19 cases, I urge the ECI to consider holding the remaining phases in ONE go. This will protect the people from further exposure to #COVID19.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
"নব আনন্দে জাগো আজি নবরবিকিরণে
শুভ্র সুন্দর প্রীতি-উজ্জ্বল নির্মল জীবনে।।"

শুভ নববর্ষের আন্তরিক প্রীতি, শুভেচ্ছা ও অভিনন্দন।
১৪২৮ কাটুক নিরাপদে, আনন্দে ও সুখ-শান্তিতে।
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Greetings to all on the auspicious occasion of Chaitra Navratri https://t.co/R46Yi8QBri
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: To protest against the undemocratic and unconstitutional decision of the Election Commission of India, I will sit on dharna tomorrow at Gandhi Murti, Kolkata from 12 noon.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
EC should rename MCC as Modi Code of Conduct!

BJP can use all its might but NOTHING in this world can stop me from being with my people & sharing their pain. 

They can restrict me from visiting my brothers & sisters in Cooch Behar for 3 days but I WILL be there on the 4th day!
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
আমি বাংলার সকল মা, ভাই ও বোনেদের আবেদন করব, সকলে আজ বিপুল সংখ্যায় নিজের গণতান্ত্রিক অধিকার প্রয়োগ করুন। 

I urge my brothers and sisters in Bengal to come out in large numbers and exercise their democratic right today.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: GoWB is setting up a university named after  Harichand Thakur & Guruchand Thakur. We have created Matua Sangha Vikash Parshad, and developing Thakur Bari as a tourist spot. Our Matua brothers and sisters are already citizens of this country. No one can take away their rights 2/2
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Tribute to Sri Sri Harichand Thakur, the founder of the Matua community, on his janmatithi. We have declared this day as a state holiday in his honour. GoWB is committed to the welfare of the Matua community 1/2
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: The blatant misuse of Central forces continues unabated. Despite us repeatedly raising this issue, @ECISVEEP continues to be a mute spectator while men in uniform are being misused at several places to openly intimidate TMC voters & influence many to vote in favour of one party. https://t.co/l6t28mxwBO
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
বাংলার মা-মাটি-মানুষকে আমার আবেদন - নিজের গণতান্ত্রিক অধিকার প্রয়োগ করুন, সবাই আসুন, ভোট দিন। সকাল সকাল ভোট দিন। 

My appeal to the Maa-Mati-Manush of Bengal - Do exercise your democratic right to vote. Come out in large numbers and vote today.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Deeply grieved at the dastardly attack on our soldiers in Chhattisgarh. My heartfelt condolences to the families of those martyred in the line of duty. I salute the supreme sacrifice made for the nation by these brave-hearts. Prayers for the speedy recovery of those injured.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Greetings to all my brothers and sisters on the occasion of Easter Sunday. May the peace and joy of this day, instil hope in our hearts for the future.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: It's a proud moment for the whole state & I extend my heartfelt congratulations to all the teachers, researchers, students & everyone associated with the University of Calcutta for their earnest contribution and brilliant performance. (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Pleased to share that Calcutta University has been adjudged 1st among all Indian universities for merit & performance, as per the renowned Shanghai Ranking or Academic Ranking of World Universities 2020. CU has also ranked 3rd among all higher education institutes in India.(1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Congratulations, Team India! Clean sweep of all three formats vs England in a spectacular finish! The better team always wins, no matter what the adversity! May the Boys in Blue continue to excel in future and bring more laurels for our country.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
বাংলার সকল মানুষকে আমি অনুরোধ করব নিজের গণতান্ত্রিক অধিকার প্রয়োগ করুন, সবাই আসুন, ভোট দিন।

I call upon the people of Bengal to exercise their democratic right by coming out and voting in large numbers.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: বার্ষিক ₹১০,০০০ একর পিছু সহায়তা করা হবে প্রান্তিক কৃষকদের। আর এটা বাংলার সকল বসবাসকারীদের প্রতি আমার প্রতিজ্ঞা যে আপানদেরকে দেওয়া প্রতিটি প্রতিশ্রুতি আমি পূরণ করব। (৪/৪)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: প্রথমবার বাংলার প্রত্যেক পরিবারের ন্যূনতম মাসিক আয় সুনিশ্চিত করার জন্য নতুন প্রকল্প শুরু করা হবে যেখানে ১.৬ কোটি যোগ্য পরিবারের কর্ত্রীকে মাসিক সহায়তা প্রদান করা হবে। বাংলার পড়ুয়াদের জন্য নতুন স্টুডেন্ট ক্রেডিট কার্ডে ₹১০ লক্ষ টাকা ক্রেডিট লিমিট থাকবে মাত্র ৪% সুদে। (৩/৪)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: বিগত দশ বছরের উন্নয়নের উপর ভিত্তি করে, আগামী পাঁচ বছরে এই স্তম্ভগুলির পরিপূর্ণতাই আমার ১০ অঙ্গীকার। দেশের পঞ্চম বৃহত্তম অর্থনীতি গড়ব আমরা এবং বার্ষিক ৫ লক্ষ নতুন কর্মসংস্থান করা হবে। (২/৪)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: আমাদেরকে এটা নিশ্চিত করতে হবে যাতে বাংলার উন্নয়ন থেমে না থাকে, তাই তৃতীয়বার বাংলার মানুষের সেবায় নিয়োজিত হওয়ার লক্ষ্যে আমার আন্তরিক প্রতিশ্রুতি আপনাদের সামনে উপস্থাপন করছি, যার মাধ্যমে উন্নততর বাংলা তৈরির পথে আমরা এগিয়ে যাবো। (১/৪) https://t.co/XxawQrQyxU
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Additionally, we are going to provide ₹10,000 per acre per annum to all small and marginal farmers. All 10 ‘Ongikars’ are my personal commitment and I promise to deliver them to the people of Bengal. (4/4)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: For the first time, female heads of 1.6 Cr households will benefit from a monthly Basic Income Support scheme, students will be able to take loans upto ₹10 Lakh using Student Credit Card at 4% interest rate only. (3/4)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: The 10 ‘Ongikars’ will form the foundation of our governance and will be the roadmap for the next five years. Focus will be on making Bengal India's fifth-largest economy by creating 5 lakh new jobs every year. (2/4)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: I humbly present my 10 ‘Ongikars’ to build a stronger & more prosperous Bengal so that the wheels of development keep moving forward in the third term of our government. The aim is just one, to sustain Bengal as one of the leading states in the country. (1/4) https://t.co/K0xNtrt7GB
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
We will continue to fight boldly! 

I'm still in a lot of pain, but I feel the pain of my people even more. 

In this fight to protect our revered land, we have suffered a lot and will suffer more but we will NEVER bow down to COWARDICE!
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: As a mark of respect and encouraged by my brothers and sisters of Nandigram, I am contesting #BengalElections2021 as @AITCofficial candidate from this historic place. It is my great honour to be here and work along with members of Shaheed families against anti-Bengal forces 3/3
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: In memory of those who lost their lives in #Nandigram, we observe March 14 as #KrishakDibas every year and give away the #KrishakRatna awards. Farmers are our pride and our government is working for their all-round development 2/3
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: On this day, in 2007, innocent villagers were killed in firing at #Nandigram. Many bodies could not be found. It was a dark chapter in the history of the State. Heartfelt tribute to all those who lost their lives 1/3
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
মতুয়া সম্প্রদায়ের প্রবর্তক শ্রী শ্রী হরিচাঁদ ঠাকুরের প্রয়াণ দিবসে জানাই অন্তরের শ্রদ্ধা। সমাজের পিছিয়ে পড়া মানুষের উন্নয়নে ওনার অবদান অনস্বীকার্য। 

Homage to Shri Shri Harichand Thakur, founder of the Matua community, on his death anniversary
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: While the Centre has not yet brought the Women’s Reservation Bill in #Parliament, I am proud that @AITCofficial has 41% women MPs in Lok Sabha and 31% in Rajya Sabha. We have also reserved 50% seats in local bodies for women candidates #IWD2021 3/3
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: In #Bengal, Swasthya Sathi cards are issued in the name of the eldest woman family member as Head of family. Also, since 2011, more than 6.7 lakh SHGs have been formed in WB, empowering 90 lakh women #IWD2021 2/3
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: On #IWD2021 I want to congratulate all the women around the world. Best wishes to my sisters (and brothers too). GoWB is committed to the welfare and empowerment of women 1/3
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
BJP is looting people by regularly hiking LPG prices. Women have been hit the hardest & I’m disgusted at Centre’s lack of intent to cut taxes & lessen their burden. In protest, today I’ll be leading an all women michil at Siliguri. 

REDUCE LPG PRICES NOW! 

#IndiaAgainstLPGLoot
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Wishing my dear colleague & friend from Tamil Nadu, DMK President @mkstalin a very Happy Birthday! 

Praying for your good health & many long and successful years in public life.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Homage to Bir Chilarai, the younger brother and commander-in-chief of King Nara Narayan, on his birth anniversary. Best wishes to my Rajbanshi brothers and sisters on this occasion
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
ভারত সেবাশ্রম সঙ্ঘের প্রতিষ্ঠাতা প্রণবানন্দজী মহারাজের জন্মতিথিতে জানাই শ্রদ্ধার্ঘ্য 

Deepest respect to Sri Pranavananda Ji Maharaj, founder of the Bharat Sevashram Sangha, on his janmatithi
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
A total of 56,500 workers (40,500 unskilled, 8000 semi-skilled, 8000 skilled) will benefit from this.
These wages are in parity with rural workers’ enhanced pay (MNREGA unskilled & semi-skilled). 
Budget provision for this step has been made available for both FY21 & FY22.

(2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
I am pleased to announce a HIKE in the wages of daily wage workers under WB Urban Employment Scheme: 

>  To ₹202 per day from ₹144 earlier for unskilled labour

> To ₹303 from ₹172 earlier for semi-skilled 

> ₹404 for skilled labour (new category introduced)

(1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
আজ অমর ২১শে ফেব্রুয়ারি। ভাষা শহিদ দিবস। এই ঐতিহাসিক দিনে বাংলা ভাষার জন্য যারা প্রাণ দিয়েছিলেন তাদের জানাই সশ্রদ্ধ প্রণাম। 

সকলকে জানাই আন্তর্জাতিক মাতৃভাষা দিবসের শুভেচ্ছা। সব ভাষাকেই সম্মান জানানো উচিত, কিন্তু মাতৃভাষাকে ভালোবাসতেই হবে।
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
I would like to thank everyone at GoWB who've led the fight against #COVID from the front— medics, paramedics, police, govt staff, teachers & other parasatals. 

I care for all my colleagues at GoWB & have personally requested @wbdhfw to ensure max vaccination coverage for them.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
সরস্বতী মহাভাগে বিদ্যে কমললোচনে 
বিশ্বরূপে বিশালাক্ষী বিদ্যাং দেহি নমোহস্তুতে।।

সরস্বতী পুজো উপলক্ষে সকলকে জানাই আন্তরিক শুভেচ্ছা

Heartiest greetings to all my brothers and sisters on the occasion of Saraswati Pujo
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
We are actively considering to extend this Bigyani Kanya Medha Britti scheme to girl students in classes XI and XII.

My best wishes to everyone. (4/4)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Named by me, the Bigyani Kanya Medha Britti scheme awards meritorious girl science students every year for excellence. Awardees receive a monthly scholarship of Rs.2000 and a yearly book grant of Rs.2500 for 5 years. (3/4)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Bengal has given to the world some of the greatest names in science and research. To encourage girl students of the State who are pursuing Degree Courses, we have instituted the Bigyani Kanya Medha Britti scheme since 2017. (2/4)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Today is International Day for Women and Girls in Science.

Our respect, heartiest congratulations and best wishes to all the scientists and members of scientific community, both men and women, on this great day. We are very proud of them.  (1/4)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is World Pulses Day. You will be happy to know that #GoWB has won the Krishi Karman’ award for Pulses Production for the years 2011-12 and 2015-16. My solidarity with all farmers on this day
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Deeply shocked and very saddened at the loss of lives in the disaster that took place in Uttarakhand. My deepest condolences to the families of the deceased. Wishing a speedy and full recovery for those injured in the calamity.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened to hear about the passing of Akhtar Ali, a true tennis legend. ‘Akhtar Sir' coached many of India’s tennis champions. We conferred Bengal’s highest sporting award on him in 2015. I was fortunate to always receive his warm affection. Condolences to his family and admirers
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: RT @HomeBengal: .... to observe the birthday of Pandit Murmu as a respectful holiday on the ensuing Buddhapurnima day ( 26th May 2021).  Sa…
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: RT @HomeBengal: The grandson of Pandit Raghunath Murmu, the pioneer of Santhal enlightenment in India, has congratulated Hon' ble Chief Min…
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
“নানা ভাষা, নানা মত, নানা পরিধান, বিবিধের মাঝে দেখো মিলন মহান"

সকলকে জানাই সম্প্রীতি দিবসের শুভেচ্ছা 

Greetings to all on the occasion of Sampriti Dibas
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
"The unity we desire will last only if we cultivate a yielding and charitable disposition towards one another” 
Homage to Mahatma Gandhi on his death anniversary. May his ideals of non-violence and communal harmony guide our nation towards prosperity
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
I am shocked at what is happening to senior journalist @sardesairajdeep 
It is also surprising how most in the media are silent on this issue. In our democratic system we must raise our voice. The media is an important pillar of our democracy
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Through feedback received on @DidiKeBolo, GoWB implemented the 6th Pay Commission, expanded Samajik Suraksha Yojana & started programmes like Pathashree, Duare Sarkar, Paray Samadhan, Jai Johar, Sneher Paras, Prochesta Prakalpa, Taposili Bandhu & many others. (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
I'm pleased at the completion of 500 Days of my initiative 'Didi Ke Bolo'. Over this course, 28 Lakh people reached out to the helpline 91370 91370 with more than 80 Lakh interactions taking place. I thank each one of you for your support & response.
#500DaysOfDidiKeBolo (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Homage to ‘Punjab Kesari’ Lala Lajpat Rai on his birth anniversary. His deep love for the motherland, and the great spirit of patriotism, is an inspiration for generations to come
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
It’s been 5 years since we launched Khadya Sathi Prakalpa. Through this scheme, we have ensured food security of nearly 10 Crore people of West Bengal during the pandemic. 

Further, GoWB has also decided to provide free ration to all.

My best wishes to all on #KhadyaSathiDibas
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
First, these laws were passed without taking farmers in confidence. And then despite protests across India & farmers camping near Delhi for last 2 months, they've been extremely casual in dealing with them.
Centre should engage with the farmers & repeal the draconian laws. (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Deeply disturbed by worrying & painful developments that have unfolded on the streets of Delhi.
 
Centre's insensitive attitude and indifference towards our farmer brothers & sisters has to be blamed for this situation. (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
‘Justice, Liberty, Equality, Fraternity’

We must forever strive to protect, preserve & follow all the ideals of the Constitution.

Warm greetings to every Indian on Republic Day!

Today’s parade in Kolkata has been dedicated to Deshnayak Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Very concerned about the health condition of @laluprasadrjd Ji. Wishing him a speedy and full recovery.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is #NationalGirlChildDay. In Bengal, #Kanyashree Scheme has empowered the girl child & was awarded 1st prize in public service by @UN in 2017. More than 69 Lakh girls have been provided financial support from school to university level for their education under this scheme
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: A grand padyatra will be held today. This year's Republic Day parade in Kolkata will also be dedicated to Netaji. A siren will be sounded today at 12.15 PM. We urge everyone to blow shankh at home. Centre must also declare January 23 as a National Holiday. #DeshNayakDibas (3/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: A monument, named after Azad Hind Fauj, will be built at Rajarhat. A university named after Netaji is also being set up which shall be funded entirely by the state, and will have tie-ups with foreign universities. #DeshNayakDibas (2/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Homage to Deshnayak Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose on his 125th birthday. He was a true leader & strongly believed in unity of all people.

We are celebrating this day as #DeshNayakDibas. GoWB has also set up a committee to conduct year-long celebrations till January 23, 2022. (1/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: RT @HomeBengal: Our thoughts are with the victims & the families of those involved in the unfortunate Dhupguri accident. An ex-gratia of ₹2…
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Saddened at the loss of lives because of a bus accident in Dhupguri. Condolences to the bereaved families. I pray for a speedy recovery of those injured

ধুপগুড়িতে বাস দুর্ঘটনা অত্যন্ত দুঃখজনক। মৃত ব্যক্তিদের পরিবারের প্রতি আমার সমবেদনা। আহতদের দ্রুত আরোগ্য কামনা করি
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened to hear about the death of Prof(Dr.) JC Chattopadhyay, HoD Anatomy, Medical College Kolkata due to #COVID19. He served @wbdhfw in various capacities since 1988, was a popular teacher & had many publications to his credit. My thoughts are with his family during this time.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Congratulations to Team India for the historic cricket Test and series win in Australia. We are all so proud of you all for this wonderful team effort. 
Jai Hind !
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: I was privileged  to recently inaugurate an exhibition featuring paintings, film posters and costumes done by Soumitra Da. Am touched by the warmth and love of his family (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering Soumitra (Da) Chattopadhyay on his birth anniversary. He was a legend, who left his mark on everything he did. We miss his glorious presence (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Tribute to Sarat Chandra Chattopadhyay, legendary writer, on his death anniversary. His short stories and novels vividly depicted the life and struggles of people in rural Bengal. The legend’s works are popular even today
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is the 80th anniversary of Netaji's 'Great Escape' from his Elgin Road residence to Europe. He overcame several hardships, to lay the groundwork for his war against the British. His resilience is an inspiration for all. Jai Hind
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Delighted to share that GoWB's #DuareSarkar initiative successfully issued more than 10 Lakh SC/ST/OBC certificates in under a month's time to eligible individuals in the state.

I wholeheartedly thank all GoWB officials & volunteers for ensuring this success.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
সানন্দে জানাই যে পশ্চিমবঙ্গ সরকারের #DuareSarkar কর্মসূচির মাধ্যমে ১ মাসেরও কম সময়ে, রাজ্যের তফসিলি, আদিবাসী এবং অন্যান্য অনগ্রসর সম্প্রদায়ভুক্ত মানুষদের মধ্যে ১০ লক্ষেরও বেশি SC/ST/OBC সার্টিফিকেট বিতরণ করা হয়েছে।

এই প্রচেষ্টার সাথে যুক্ত সকল কর্মীদের আমার অসংখ্য ধন্যবাদ।
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is #ArmyDay. On this occasion, I salute everyone who has dedicated their lives to the service of the nation. Jai Hind
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Fondly remembering Mahashweta Di on her birth anniversary. We miss her. She was not only an acclaimed littérateur, but also a dedicated social activist, and a guide at a personal level. Her work for the tribals and the downtrodden continues to inspire us
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Heartiest greetings to everyone on the auspicious occasion of Makar Sankranti. Lakhs of pilgrims will take the holy dip today at Gangasagar. My best wishes to all. Sab tirtha baar baar, Gangasagar ek baar
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Wishing everyone on the occasion of Poush Sankranti. May the pithe-puli add sweetness in your lives. I pray for the prosperity of every household in #Bengal
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
পৌষ তোদের ডাক দিয়েছে, আয়রে চলে আয়...

সকলকে জানাই পৌষ সংক্রান্তির শুভেচ্ছা। পিঠে-পুলিতে মিষ্টিমুখ হোক সকলের। বাংলার ঘরে ঘরে আসুক সমৃদ্ধি।
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Greetings to all on the auspicious occasion of #Lohri. May your lives be filled with happiness, peace and prosperity. #HappyLohri
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Remembering the great leader Swami Vivekananda on his birth anniversary. I bow down to Swamiji's teachings.

His message of peace & universal brotherhood is of utmost relevance today & inspires all of us to strive hard in safeguarding these ideals in our beloved nation.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Tribute to Lal Bahadur Shastri, former prime minister, on his death anniversary. He gave us the inspirational slogan ‘Jai Jawan, Jai Kisan’. We are proud of our farmer brothers and sisters. Farmers are the heroes of our nation. The Centre MUST repeal the anti-farmer Acts NOW!
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Thank you @anubhavsinha for being with us for the opening of #KIFF It was our pleasure to host you. Thanks also for appreciating the ‘unrelenting, never changing spirit’ of Kolkata. In this film-loving city, the show must go on! https://t.co/MSNxLB249G
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Further, benefits of other GoWB schemes like Kanyashree, Rupashree, Khadya Sathi, Aikyashree, Shikshashree, Jai Johar, Taposhili Bandhu, Manabik etc were extended to lakhs of people. Everyone who applied for various services at the camps were also provided helping hands. (3/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Almost 90 Lakh people across West Bengal received different kinds of services. This includes 62 Lakh beneficiaries under Swasthya Sathi, 7 Lakh beneficiaries who received SC/ST/OBC certificates & 4 Lakh beneficiaries who received assistance under Krishak Bandhu. (2/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Happy to share that as of 4pm today, the total number of visitors in #DuareSarkar camps has crossed 2 Crores!

I once again congratulate & thank every single GoWB official for ensuring smooth door-step delivery of Govt services & benefits. Thanking all participants too! (1/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Together we will overcome this pandemic. But the show must go on. We are going ahead with  #KIFF 2021 virtually, on a smaller scale. Glad that my brother @iamsrk will join us virtually at the inaugural event on Jan 8, 4pm. Watch Kolkata International Film Festival live
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: My thoughts and prayers are with the renowned physician, Dr Sukumar Mukherjee. I wish him a speedy and complete recovery. Get well soon, Sukumar Da
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Sad to hear that @SGanguly99 suffered a mild cardiac arrest and has been admitted to hospital.

Wishing him a speedy and full recovery. My thoughts and prayers are with him and his family!
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: I am deeply saddened and pained to have lost a dearest colleague of over four decades, Manik (da) Majumdar. His ever-smiling face at my office in Kalighat, where he worked diligently and quietly, will be deeply missed by us all.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened at the passing away of Buta Singh ji, eight-time Lok Sabha MP and former Union Cabinet Minister. My heartfelt condolences to his family, friends and supporters
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
On #TMCFoundationDay, I extend my sincere gratitude to our Maa-Mati-Manush and all our workers who continue to fight with us in making Bengal better and stronger each day. 

The Trinamool family will carry on with this resolve for times to come! (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
As Trinamool turns 23 today, I look back at the journey we began on January 1st, 1998. 

Our years have been of immense struggle, but throughout this time we have continued to achieve our objective of being committed to the cause of only the people. (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: On this day in 1943, Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose had hoisted the Tricolour for the first time in #PortBlair. On the 77th anniversary of that historic event, tribute to the great leader. #Netaji - a great son of this country - continues to inspire us
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Our farmer brothers & sisters have been on streets protesting against new farm laws. Instead of addressing them, PM today chose to mislead the people with half-truth & distorted facts. BJP-led Centre is not cooperating & only indulging in propaganda for petty political gains. https://t.co/gtngklCruy
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: I wish all my brothers and sisters around the world #MerryChristmas. In Bengal we celebrate Christmas and all festivals in a grand manner. Do visit @KolChristmas Festival (virtually)on Park Street and many other venues. Spread the message of peace and joy.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
"বিশ্বসাথে যোগে যেথায় বিহারো, সেইখানে যোগ তোমার সাথে আমারো"

Visva Bharati University turns 100. This temple of learning was Rabindranath Tagore’s greatest experiment on creating the ideal human being. We must preserve the vision and philosophy of this great visionary
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: #NationalFarmersDay https://t.co/Qe9I4p6klo
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
My heartiest greetings to all my Santhal sisters & brothers on the auspicious Santhali Language Day.

This is the day of extreme pride after years of struggles & sacrifices. Johar! https://t.co/z9cxsVHQA4
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: সাঁওতাল ভাষা দিবসের শুভদিনে শুভেচ্ছা ও অভিনন্দন জানাই আমার সকল সাঁওতাল ভাই বোনেদের....অনেক সংগ্রাম আর বলিদানের ফসল এই দিন আমাদের খুব কাছের . জয় জোহার
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Centre is brazenly interfering with State Govt functioning by transferring police officers. My gratitude to @bhupeshbaghel @ArvindKejriwal @capt_amarinder @ashokgehlot51 & @mkstalin for showing solidarity to people of Bengal & reaffirming their commitment to federalism.Thank you!
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: e-Abgari has been adjudged as a National Best Practice and 7 states have already adopted this model. Hon’ble President of India will be conferring this award to the West Bengal Team on 30th December. I congratulate the entire team that worked on this for making WB proud. (3/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: With an extensive IT-driven process re-engineering, e-Abgari has completely transformed the activities of Excise Directorate. Further, this initiative has ensured efficiency, transparency, while safeguarding health and the government revenue at the same time. (2/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: It gives me an immense pleasure to inform that 'e-Abgari' project of Excise Directorate, under the Finance Department, has been declared as WINNER of the prestigious DIGITAL INDIA AWARD-2020 for exemplary and innovative initiatives in the realm of Digital Governance. (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
I assure all that we will leave no stone unturned in ensuring that the people of Bengal are able to get the benefits of Govt services that they are eligible for, right at their doorstep! (3/3)

#1KotirDuareSarkar
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
I wholeheartedly congratulate all the GoWB officials & volunteers who worked round the clock to organize these camps every single day at such a massive scale. I would also like to thank every participant who visited and availed services at these camps. (2/3)

#1KotirDuareSarkar
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
I am immensely pleased to announce that in just 2 weeks, over 1 Crore people across Bengal have enthusiastically visited more than 10,000 #DuareSarkar camps envisioned to ensure doorstep delivery of Govt services and benefits (1/3) 

#1KotirDuareSarkar
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: #GoWB runs the “Aikyashree”scheme to provide scholarships to minority students. Since 2011, 2.03 crore scholarships worth Rs 5,657 crore have been provided to minority students, the highest in the country (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is #MinorityRightsDay. India is the land of unity in diversity, and it is our duty to protect the rights of people of all faiths, communities, castes and creeds. We believe in communal harmony. Unity is strength. Divided we fall (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering Tapasi Malik on her death anniversary. The young protestor from Singur was raped and burnt to death during the farmers’ agitation in 2006. On this occasion, I once against iterate my support for the ongoing farmers’ protest #StandWithFarmers
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: We wouldn’t allow this brazen attempt by the Centre to control the State machinery by proxy! West Bengal is not going to cow-down in front of expansionist & undemocratic forces. (3/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: This act is nothing but a deliberate attempt to encroach upon State’s jurisdiction & demoralize the serving officers in WB. This move, particularly before the elections is against the basic tenets of the federal structure. It's unconstitutional & completely unacceptable! (2/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: GoI’s order of central deputation for the 3 serving IPS officers of West Bengal despite the State’s objection is a colourable exercise of power and blatant misuse of emergency provision of IPS Cadre Rule 1954. (1/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Best wishes and heartiest greetings to all my Lepcha and Bhutia brothers and sisters on Namsoong and Losoong festivals. May the new year bring the best of health, peace and prosperity for you
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: With environment-friendly electric bus and CNG bus service, #Bengal is the pioneer in introducing environment-friendly transportation on such a large scale. #Kolkata has also bagged international C40 Award for electric transportation system 2/2
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is National Energy Conservation Day. #GoWB is continuously augmenting the generation of energy from renewable sources. With this aim in mind, Grid-connected-Rooftop Solar Photovoltaic Plants are being installed in all schools and government buildings in the State 1/2
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Heard about BJP National President Shri @JPNadda testing positive for COVID-19. Wishing him a speedy recovery and good health. My prayers are with him and his family during this time.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened to hear about the passing away of our dear senior colleauge Radhika (da) Ranjan Pramanik. A 5-time MP, much loved, much respected and much admired by us all. A man with vast experience.  A big loss for the Trinamool family. My condolences to his family and admirers
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Tribute to Pranab (Da) Mukherjee, former President of India, on his birth anniversary. His demise has left a void in Indian politics. We miss him a lot
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: The GoWB  has set up 19 human rights courts in the last nine and half years. It was after repeated protests and movements by me that the West Bengal #HumanRights Commission was set up in 1995. My best wishes to all 2/2
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is #HumanRightsDay. Nowadays, there is a big trend to bulldoze democracy, crush fundamental rights, and muzzle the voice of the people. Our government is committed to upholding #humanrights 1/2
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Concerned to hear that former Chief Minister Buddhadeb Bhattacharjee has been hospitalised with breathing problems. Praying for his speedy recovery and wishing him well
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: My best wishes on your birthday Sonia Gandhi Ji. I pray for your long life and happiness
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: On this day in 1946, the Constituent Assembly met for the first time. Tribute to all members of Constituent Assembly who gave shape to India’s Constitution. These days, ‘A’ political party is misusing the Constitution. Let us pray together to save our Constitution. Save our India
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Tribute to Bagha Jatin, freedom fighter, on his birth anniversary. He played a significant role in the freedom struggle against the British. His spirit of patriotism continues to inspire us.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: On this day in 1930, the historic trio of Benoy, Badal and Dinesh stormed the Writers' Building. Badal Gupta attained martyrdom on the very day itself. Their heroism will be remembered by generations to come. My homage to the martyrs.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Very sad at the passing away of our colleague Mrigendra Nath Maiti, MLA since 2011, Chairman of Midnapore Kharagpur Development Authority. He was a tireless worker for people and State Government Workers’ Union. I visited his home to condole with the family
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened at the passing away of veteran theatre and film actor Manu Mukherjee. We conferred on him the Lifetime Achievement Award at the Tele-Samman Awards 2015. My condolences to his family, colleagues and admirers
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Homage to Dinesh Gupta on his birth anniversary. The legendary trio of Benoy, Badal and Dinesh have inspired generations of Indians with their heroic attack on Writers’ Building in 1930. We salute them for their ultimate sacrifice for the country
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Tribute to Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar on his death anniversary. His contribution to framing India’s Constitution will forever be remembered by the generations to come
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: We observe 6th December as ‘Sanhati Dibas’ in #Bengal. There is a famous song in #Bangla which says: “নানা ভাষা, নানা মত, নানা পরিধান, বিবিধের মাঝে দেখো মিলন মহান” (India is a milieu of diverse languages, philosophies, cultures, lifestyles). We believe in unity in diversity
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
14 years ago on 4 Dec  2006, I began my 26 day hunger strike in Kolkata demanding that agricultural land cannot be forcefully acquired. I express my solidarity with all farmers who are protesting against draconian farm bills passed without consultation by Centre
#StandWithFarmers
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: On the occasion of #NavyDay, I salute all the brave sailors who guard our waters. Jai Hind
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened to hear about the tragic death of Dr Hasi Dasgupta, who lost the battle to COVID-19. She was serving as the Principal of College of Medicine & Sagore Dutta Hospital. We remain in gratitude for her contributions. My prayers are with her family in this tough time.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: The GOI  is selling everything. You cannot sell Railways, Air India, Coal, BSNL, BHEL, banks, defence,  etc. Withdraw ill-conceived disinvestment & privatization policy. We must not allow treasures of our nation to be transformed into  BJP party’s personal assets.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: We have called a meeting of the the All India Trinamool Congress on Friday, December 4. We will discuss how the Essential Commodities Act is impacting common people and resulting in sky rocketing prices. The central government must withdraw this anti-people law
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: I am very much concerned about the farmers, their lives and livelihood. GOI must withdraw the anti-farmer bills. If they do not do so immediately we will agitate throughout the state and the country. From the very start, we have been strongly opposing these anti-farmer bills.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is International Day of Persons with Disabilities. #GoWB launched ‘Manobik’ scheme where differently-abled persons with 40% or more disabilities receive monthly pension. Also, family income bar raised to Rs 2 lakh/year for scholarships of differently-abled students in 2020.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Paying homage to Shaheed Khudiram Bose on his birth anniversary. One of the youngest to lay down his life for the freedom of our country, his valour & fearless spirit continues to inspire us, even today.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Services corresponding to Khadya Sathi, Swasthya Sathi, Caste Certificates, Sikshashree, Kanyashree, Rupashree, Aikyashree, Jai Johar, Taposili Bandhu, Krishak Bandhu & 100-days work will be available along with receiving applications or grievances for other schemes. (3/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
#DuareSarkar's four phases will take place between:
->1st Dec-11th Dec 2020
->15th Dec-24th Dec 2020 
->2nd Jan-12th Jan 2021
->18th Jan-30th Jan 2021

Camps will be organized at every Gram Panchayat, Municipality & Municipal Corporation from 10 am-4 pm across the state. (2/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
GoWB's initiative #DuareSarkar brings govt services at people's doorstep! Happy to see that the camps have started in full-swing.

These camps will be held 4 times in 4 rounds across WB.

I urge people to get their grievances redressed & avail other services at these camps. (1/3) https://t.co/ngOobzZ19X
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering the great Shri Acharya Jagadish Chandra Bose on his 162nd birthday. His contribution to the world science forum is unparalleled and he shall always be remembered as the pride of Bengal.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Heartfelt respect on the auspicious occasion of the Parkash Purab of Shri Guru Nanak Dev Ji
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Saddened and shocked at the passing away of Indrajit Bhattacharjee,
Chairman, Borough 16, Kolkata Municipal Corporation. He worked tirelessly for all citizens & was a trusted, diligent member of Trinamool Congress. My heartfelt condolences to his family, friends and colleagues.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: On #ConstitutionDay, homage to Dr BR Ambedkar & the Constituent Assembly who gave shape to the democratic framework of India. Let us keep the spirit of our Constitution alive - Sovereignty, Socialism, Secularist, Democratic, Republic, Justice, Liberty, Fraternity, and Equality
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened and shocked at the passing away of Ahmed Patel. He was a quiet, affable person. My condolences to his family, admirers and his colleagues.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened to hear about the passing away of veteran leader and former Chief Minister of Assam for 3 terms, Tarun Gogoi Ji. My deepest condolences to his family, followers and well-wishers
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
জয়দে জগদানন্দে জগদেক প্রপূজিতে।
জয় সর্ব্বগতে দুর্গে জগদ্ধাত্রী নমোঽস্তুতে॥

সকলকে জানাই জগদ্ধাত্রী পুজোর শুভেচ্ছা 
Heartiest greetings to all on the occasion of Jagaddhatri Pujo
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Heartiest greetings to the people of Bengal, India and all over the world on the auspicious occasion of Chhath Puja. May Lord Surya fulfill all your wishes

बंगाल, भारत और विश्व में सभी को छठ पूजा के शुभ अवसर पर हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं। भगवान सूर्य आप सभी की मनोकामनाएं पूर्ण करें
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened at the passing away of Sahitya Academy award-winning poet and translator Alokeranjan Dasgupta. My condolences to his family and admirers
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
আজ ভাইফোঁটা। আমার সকল ভাই ও বোনেদের জানাই শুভেচ্ছা ও ভালবাসা
Greetings to all my brothers and sisters on the occasion of Bhai Dooj 
भाई दूज के अवसर पर मेरे सभी भाइयों और बहनों को शुभकामनाएं
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Best known for his films with Satyajit Ray, Soumitra Da was conferred with Legion of Honor, Dadasaheb Phalke Award, Banga Bibhushan, Padma Bhushan & several National Awards. A great loss. Saddened. Condolences to his family, the film fraternity & his admirers across the world 2/2
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Feluda’ is no more.  ‘Apu’ said goodbye. Farewell, Soumitra (Da) Chatterjee. He has been a legend in his lifetime. International, Indian and Bengali cinema has lost a giant. We will miss him dearly. The film world in Bengal has been orphaned 1/2
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Paying homage to the great freedom fighter & tribal leader ‘Dharti Aaba’ Bhagwan Birsa Munda on his Jayanti today. 

He founded a new religion & fought for rights of the tribes. His life serves as an inspiration till date.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
সকলকে জানাই কালী পুজো ও দীপাবলির আন্তরিক শুভেচ্ছা। সবাই মিলে আনন্দ করুন, কিন্তু দূরত্ববিধি মেনে। মাস্ক পরুন, সাবধানে থাকুন। 

Heartiest greetings to all on the occasion of Kali Pujo and Deepavali. Please maintain physical distancing during festivities. Wear a mask, stay safe.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Heartiest greetings to all on the occasion of Bhoot Chaturdashi. Let us all observe this day by lighting ‘choddo bati’ and eating ‘choddo shaak’

সকলকে জানাই ভূত চতুর্দশীর শুভেচ্ছা। চোদ্দো শাক আর চোদ্দো বাতিতে মঙ্গলময় হয়ে উঠুক সকলের জীবন
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is Nandigram Dibas - the 13th anniversary of the barbaric massacre in the name of ‘new dawn’. My homage to all those who have lost their lives due to political violence across the world. Peace must always win
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Congratulations to President Elect @JoeBiden and Vice President @KamalaHarris May the India-US friendship grow
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Tribute to Deshbandhu Chittaranjan Das, legendary freedom fighter, on his birth anniversary. His undying devotion for the service of the motherland continues to inspire us. We are proud that he was the Mayor of the great city of #Kolkata
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Warmest birthday greetings to @iamsrk. Wish you good health and all the success in life, my charming brother. Wish you all the success in your future endeavours.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering ABA Ghani Khan Choudhury, stalwart leader from #Bengal, and former Union Minister, on his birth anniversary
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Greetings to people of Karnataka, Kerala, Punjab, Haryana, Madhya Pradesh & Chhattisgarh on the foundation day of their States. Article 1 of Constitution states that India, that is Bharat, shall be a Union of States. Let us strengthen our federal structure. Jai Hind. Joy Bangla
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: With immense pride, I'm happy to announce that GoWB has won the highest Skoch Award for providing children aged 3 to 6 with a home-based education program via audio tutorials & activities. I congratulate all for ensuring that education reaches our children even amid the pandemic. https://t.co/MxnC2rDT9Q
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: My best wishes and greetings to all on the occasion of Milad-un-Nabi, birthday of the Holy Prophet (PBUH). May the spirit of love and service to humanity, tolerance and universal brotherhood, which the Holy Prophet preached, kindle our lives with joy.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
এসো মা লক্ষ্মী বসো ঘরে…
সকলকে জানাই কোজাগরী লক্ষ্মী পুজোর শুভেচ্ছা। বাংলার ঘরে ঘরে আসুক সুখ ও সমৃদ্ধি

आप सभी को लक्ष्मी पूजा की हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं। बंगाल के हर घर में आए सुख और समृद्धि।
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: After receiving global film fraternity's consent, I hereby inform all stakeholders of Kolkata International Film Festival & cine lovers that our festival has been rescheduled, given the current circumstances. It will now be held from Jan 8-15, 2021. Let the preparations begin!
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Deeply grieved to hear about the passing away of WB Assembly Dy Speaker & Jhargram MLA Shri Sukumar Hansda. He was also serving as AITC State Vice President. His relentless service for people shall always be remembered. My condolences to his family & followers.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: The house of Sister Nivedita in Bagbazar, Kolkata, and 'Roy Villa' in Darjeeling, where she breathed her last, were renovated by #GoWB and handed over to Ramakrishna Mission (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Tribute to Sister Nivedita,social activist & educationist,on her birth anniversary.She believed that service to mankind is the true service to God. She played a significant role in the education of girls & took care of the poor during the plague epidemic in Calcutta in 1899 (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: উৎসবের শেষে ফের উৎসবের শুরু। সমৃদ্ধির দেবী ভান্ডানি পুজো উপলক্ষে জলপাইগুড়ি, আলিপুরদুয়ার এবং কোচবিহার জেলার রাজবংশী সহ সর্বধর্ম সম্প্রদায়ের মানুষকে জানাই শুভেচ্ছা
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Greetings to all my brothers and sisters in the Hills on the occasion of Dasain
আমার পাহাড়ের ভাই ও বোনেদের জানাই দশাইন এর আন্তরিক শুভেচ্ছা
पहाड़ों में रहने वाले मेरे सभी भाइयों और बहनों को दशैन के अवसर पर हार्दिक बधाई https://t.co/1Lqix6k3fA
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: বাংলার মা, মাটি, মানুষকে জানাই শুভ বিজয়ার আন্তরিক প্রীতি ও শুভেচ্ছা। বড়দের জানাই প্রণাম, ছোটদের ভালোবাসা। মায়ের এবার যাওয়ার পালা। বিষাদের সুরে, মিষ্টিমুখে আসুন সকলে বলি, আসছে বছর আবার হবে। https://t.co/036TxAU30i
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: সকলকে জানাই মহানবমীর শুভেচ্ছা। আজ সকলের মন বলছে, যেও না নবমী নিশি... ধুনুচি নাচের তালে, ঢাকের বোলে মায়ের সাথে শেষ দিনটা আনন্দে কাটুক https://t.co/K6N4qCWEEJ
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: সকলকে জানাই মহাষ্টমীর শুভেচ্ছা। পুস্পাঞ্জলির মন্ত্রে এবং সন্ধি পুজোর প্রদীপের আলোকে স্নিগ্ধ হোক সবার জীবন https://t.co/Sg7l5fwkPx
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: সকলকে জানাই মহাসপ্তমীর শুভেচ্ছা। মা দুর্গার প্রাণ প্রতিষ্ঠা আজ। মৃন্ময়ী থেকে চিন্ময়ী হয়ে উঠবেন জগন্মাতা। সকলের শুভ হোক https://t.co/tv9IhJpRJz
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: সকলকে জানাই মহাষষ্ঠীর শুভেচ্ছা। মা দুর্গার আমন্ত্রণ ও অধিবাসের পুণ্যলগ্নে সকলের মঙ্গল হোক https://t.co/6mPKyplyU5
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: সকলকে জানাই মহাপঞ্চমীর শুভেচ্ছা। মা দুর্গার বোধনের মাধ্যমে ঘরে ঘরে বেজে উঠুক মঙ্গলধ্বনি https://t.co/aphPwrc8t7
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: The police family comprises humane, brave men and women . Several of them, who had contracted COVID-19 and recovered, are donating plasma. Tribute to those who passed. Well done to EVERY single member of the exceptional police teams across the nation (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: On #PoliceCommemorationDay, my best wishes to @wbpolice @kolkatapolice, and their families, for their tireless service during the pandemic to keep people safe. From this year, we are celebrating September 1 as Police Day to honour our brave forces (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: On the 77th anniversary of the formation of the #AzadHind Government, homage to the brave soldiers of #INA who fought for India’s freedom under the leadership of #Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose. Jai Hind
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: I am pleased to announce that we now have 4,000 MBBS seats for Bengal’s vibrant medical students with the initiation of the first MBBS batch in Purulia Govt MCH consisting of 100 seats & the addition of 150 MBBS seats in Gouri Devi Medical College.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: সকলকে জানাই মহাচতুর্থীর শুভেচ্ছা। মা দুর্গা সবার মঙ্গল করুন https://t.co/834VkNnAwW
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Heartiest congratulations to @Mohun_Bagan for becoming @ILeagueOfficial Champions. 

Wonderful achievement for the Green & Maroon Brigade & best wishes as you step into upcoming  @IndSuperLeague season as @atkmohunbaganfc.

#Champions5
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Wishing everyone a very Happy Navratri! Seeking blessings from Maa Durga on this auspicious occasion for the good health and prosperity of all. I would urge everyone to celebrate following all health and safety protocols!
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Congratulations to the batch of 2020 NEET students who have been successful this year. Wish you all the success in your lives. Well done to the teachers and parents for bearing with the situation. Do well, students. May all your dreams come true
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: They will also get 30 days leave & 10 days medical leave annually along with usual maternity leaves for women. They'll have tenure certainty till 60 years age & get ₹3 L on attaining 60 years as terminal benefit. Further, Swasthya Sathi will cover their medical expenses. (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Bengal is known for its e-governance & today I'm pleased to announce my Pujo gift for young IT personnel working to improve our e-services for the people of Bengal. Webel/WTL/agency-engaged IT staff in state govt shall now be directly engaged as contractual staff of GoWB. (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened at the passing away of Pradip Ghosh. He was a prominent reciter and renowned vocal artist. My condolences to his family, colleagues and his admirers.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering the Missile Man of India, Bharat Ratna awardee, and former President, Dr APJ Abdul Kalam on his birth anniversary. A visionary leader, who not just taught Young India how to dream big, but also how to fulfil that dream. May his legacy inspire generations to come.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened by the passing away of Dr AP Mukherjee IPS (Rtd.), who was recently awarded Bango Vibhushan Samman. He shall be remembered for his service as DG&IGP WB, & then as CBI Director & Governor Mizoram, along with many books he authored. My condolences to his family & friends.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Deeply saddened to hear the news of the passing away of Ram Vilas Paswan Ji. He was a veteran politician, leader and a long-time Parliamentarian. My condolences to his family, colleagues and his many admirers.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Concerned to hear about the veteran actor Soumitra Chatterjee testing positive for #COVID19. Praying for his speedy recovery and good health!
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened to hear the news of Shakti Thakur's demise. A noted playback singer in Bengali and Hindi films and an actor, Shakti Thakur gained popularity in the 80s as one of the contemporary modern music artists. His death is an irreparable loss to the music world.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Dalit-oppression by BJP ruled Govts is an open secret now. The party's Anti-Dalit ideology enforces caste-based segregation even in today's day & age.
Their hardships will not let @BJP4India & its leaders rest peacefully!

"कर रही जो दलितों का सर्वनाश,
उस भाजपा का होगा सत्यानाश।"
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Farmers are the backbone of our society. In Bengal, the average annual income of our farmers has tripled from ₹91,000 in 2011 to ₹2.91 lakh in 2018. History stands testament to what we have done for their benefits. We will continue to raise our voices for them. (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering former Prime Minister Lal Bahadur Shastri on his birth anniversary. 55 years ago, he gave us the inspirational slogan of ‘Jai Jawan, Jai Kisan’ for our proud farmer brothers & sisters. Come what may, we will always firmly stand by them till our last breath. (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: In remembrance of Gandhiji's philosophy of Ahimsa, today we also celebrate the International Day of Non-Violence. To this regard, #GoWB is setting up a university dedicated to Gandhiji in Purba Medinipur district. Let us spread Bapu’s message amongst the younger generations (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Homage to Mahatma Gandhi on his 151st birth anniversary. Icons like Gandhiji, Netaji, Tagore, Maulana Azad, Ambedkar & others tirelessly fought for freedom & democracy. Are we going to give it away so easily? Bapu’s philosophy has become more relevant now than ever before (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Deeply saddened by the passing away of @AITCofficial Bankura District Coordinator and two-time MLA Gurupada Mete. His unparalleled devotion to serve the citizens of Bengal will always be remembered. My heartfelt condolences to his family and closed ones.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: GoWB was able to collate the list of these roads after the people of Bengal reached out to me through Didi Ke Bolo, inputs were received at the CMO Grievance Redressal Cell, along with valuable inputs from the elected representatives of #Bengal. (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: I am pleased to announce the launch of #PathashreeAbhijan, an unprecedented road repair scheme, wherein more than 7,000 stretches of roads comprising 12,000 km across the state will be repaired in a mission mode in a time-bound manner. (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Have no words to condemn the barbaric & shameful incident at Hathras involving a young Dalit girl. My deepest condolences to the family.
More shameful is the forceful cremation without the family’s presence or consent, exposing those who use slogans & lofty promises for votes.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
I would also like to announce that outgoing Chief Secretary of West Bengal Shri Rajiva Sinha, has now been appointed the Chairman of West Bengal Industrial Development Corporation for a period of 3 years w.e.f 1st October.

I thank him for his tireless service to GoWB.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
I'm pleased to announce that Alapan Bandyopadhyay, now Addnl Chief Secy (Home & Information) is appointed as the new Chief Secretary of WB. 
H K Dwivedi, hitherto Finance Secy, will be new Home Secy & Manoj Pant takes charge of Finance w.e.f. 1st Oct. Best wishes to entire team.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is International Day for Universal Access to Information. It is shocking how GOI got exposed during the recent Parliament session. Most answers said 'no data available'. Every citizen has a right to information. The government is answerable and accountable to the people.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Heartiest birthday greetings to the Prime Minister of Bangladesh, Sheikh Hasina Ji. I pray for stronger ties between India and Bangladesh.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Wishing you a very happy birthday, @mangeshkarlata ji. I pray for your long and healthy life.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Tribute to freedom fighter and martyr Bhagat Singh on his birth anniversary
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Homage to Rani Rashmoni, social reformer who founded the Kali Temple in Dakshineswar, on her birth anniversary
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened at the passing away of former Defence Minister and one of India's longest-serving parliamentarians, Jaswant Singh Ji. My condolences to his family and his many admirers
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: To return to normalcy, Jatras, Plays, OATs, Cinemas & all musical, dance, recital & magic shows shall be allowed to function with 50 participants or less from 1 Oct, subject to adherence to physical distancing norms, wearing of masks & compliance to precautionary protocols.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Greetings to former Prime Minister and Economist Dr. Manmohan Singh ji on his birthday. Wishing him good health and more productive years in public life.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Vidyasagar truly represents the pride of Bengal & serves as an inspiration to us till date. His bust was unfortunately desecrated in 2019 by certain outsiders, which only shows their disregard for Bengal’s legacy. However, his teachings are deeply inculcated in our values. (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering great social reformer & educationist Ishwar Chandra Vidyasagar on his 200th birth anniversary. He was a pioneer for Bangla language & drafted primer Barnaparichay. Also known as 'Dayar Sagar', he fought for widow remarriage, banning child marriage & polygamy. (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Grieved to hear of the passing of a true legend of music, SP Balasubrahmanyam. His  golden voice will be remembered for generations. Condolences to his family, many admirers and colleagues in the music industry.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Grieved to hear about the passing away of veteran nuclear scientist and former Atomic Energy Commission chairman, Dr Sekhar Basu. My condolences to his family and colleagues.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: My heartfelt condolences to the family, close relatives & friends of Union Minister of State Shri Suresh Angadi, on his sad demise. May his soul rest in peace.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
‘Korbo, Lorbo, Jeetbo’ has already been India’s spirit in 2020, fighting crises without breaking a sweat. Another set of champions hit the field today, trying to bring joy to every home.
My best wishes to @KKRiders & dearest @iamsrk as they begin their IPL campaign.#KKRHaiTaiyaar
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Suspension of the 8 MPs who fought to protect farmers interests is unfortunate & reflective of this autocratic Govt’s mindset that doesn’t respect democratic norms & principles. We won't bow down & we'll fight this fascist Govt in Parliament & on the streets.
#BJPKilledDemocracy
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: My greetings to the Hon'ble Prime Minister Shri @narendramodi Ji on his 70th Birthday. I wish him a healthy and successful year ahead.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Heartiest greetings to all on the occasion of Bhadu Utsab.

ভাদু উৎসব উপলক্ষে সকলকে জানাই শুভেচ্ছা। পুরুলিয়া,মেদিনীপুর, ঝাড়গ্রাম, বাঁকুড়া, 
বীরভূম, বর্ধমান সহ অনেক জায়গায় পালিত হয় এই ভাদু উৎসব|
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: শ্রমিক ভাই ও বোনেদের এবং তাদের পরিবার পরিজনদের বিশ্বকর্মা পুজোর শুভেচ্ছা জানাই। তারা আমাদের গর্ব। সমাজের উন্নয়নের জন্য নিরলস পরিশ্রম করেন তারা।
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
As a part of this pledge, I vow to ensure that this Durga Pujo, no one is devoid of the festivities. I urge everyone to come forward, extend a helping hand to those in need & spread joy everywhere.
Shubho Mahalaya to everyone! (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: On the auspicious occasion of Mahalaya,I extend my warm regards to one & all.Although #COVID19 has restricted how we celebrate festivals, we shall not allow it to dampen the spirit of this Durga Puja. To this end & to lighten up every home,I undertake #MahalayaProtishruti. (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: GoWB has constantly persevered to undertake inclusive development for all by giving recognition to Hindi, Urdu, Gurmukhi, Ol Chiki, Rajbanshi, Kamtapuri, Kurukh languages. I urge the Centre to follow suit by also including Bengali as a classical language in NEP 2020. (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Warm wishes on #HindiDiwas.Bengal is a land of inclusivity and through our persistent efforts we have proudly inculcated Tagore’s values of ‘Unity in Diversity’.GoWB has taken various initiatives to strengthen Hindi Education, Culture and Welfare of the community in Bengal (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Homage to Jatindra Nath Das, freedom fighter, on his death anniversary. His 63-day hunger strike in prison was unprecedented in history. As Netaji had rightly remarked, Jatin Das was ‘Dadhichi’ of this era, who sacrificed his life for the country
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering Ajit Panja, former Union Minister and one of the founding members of @AITCofficial, on his birth anniversary
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: বিশিষ্ট সাহিত্যিক বিভূতিভূষণ বন্দ্যোপাধ্যায়ের জন্মবার্ষিকীতে প্রণাম। চাঁদের পাহাড়, আরণ্যক, পথের পাঁচালী, অপরাজিত সহ ওনার বিভিন্ন রচনা বাংলা সাহিত্যের অমূল্য সম্পদ
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Grieved at the passing of Swami Agnivesh, who gave up a career as a professor in Kolkata to fight for many causes. My condolences to his friends and followers
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Deeply grieved to hear about the demise of Debashree Chatterjee, CO 12th Bn in an unfortunate road accident on Durgapur Expressway. She was a KP officer posted on deputation to WB Police. The driver & her guard also died in the mishap. My condolences to the family of the deceased
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering Mahakavi Kanhaiyalal Sethia on his 101st birth anniversary. He wrote poetry in Hindi, Rajasthani, Urdu & received Padma Shri & Sahitya Akademi award for his literary merit. He studied in Scottish Church College & his family being based out of Kolkata for 150 yrs.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Keeping their interest in mind, while keeping the statewide lockdown as it is on Sep 11th, it has been decided to cancel the lockdown on 12th, so that the students can attend the examination on 13th without any apprehensions or concerns. I wish them all the very best. (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: GoWB had initially announced a statewide lockdown on Sep 11th & 12th. Considering the NEET 2020 examination scheduled on 13th, we have received numerous requests from the student community on lifting lockdown norms on 12th, helping ease their travel to examination centres. (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering ‘Rai Saheb’ Panchanan Barma, eminent Rajbanshi leader, on his death anniversary. We had named a university in Cooch Behar district after the great man
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Mother Teresa (now St Teresa of Kolkata) passed away on this day in 1997 after a lifetime of service to the poorest of the poor, no matter who they were. In memory of her @UN declared this day as International Day of Charity.During this pandemic let us help those who need it most
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Homage to Dr Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan, former President of India and world-renowned philosopher, on his birth anniversary
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is Teachers' Day. Teachers are our gurus. The guru-sishya parampara is a gift of India to the world. In recognition of the contribution of teachers in schools, colleges and universities, our Govt felicitates outstanding teachers with “Siksha Ratna Samman” on Teachers’ Day
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Greetings & best wishes on the occasion of Kshamavani, a day of seeking forgiveness celebrated by our Jain brothers & sisters at the conclusion of the festival of Paryushan & Das Lakshan.
Michhami Dukkadam & Uttam Kshama!🙏
Let us as a society embrace compassion and forgiveness.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Fondly remembering film legend ‘Mahanayak’ Uttam Kumar on his 94th birth anniversary. In 2012, we instituted the ‘Mahanayak Samman’ in his memory. Uttam Kumar continues to rule the hearts of Bengali film-lovers across the globe.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: So many memories.A visit to Delhi without Pranabda is unimaginable. He is a legend in all subjects from politics to economics. Will be forever grateful. Shall miss him immensely. My condolences to Abhijit & Sharmistha (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: It is with deep sorrow I write this. Bharat Ratna Pranab Mukherjee has left us. An era has ended. For decades he was a father figure. From my first win as MP, to being my senior Cabinet colleague, to his becoming President while I was CM...(1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: I salute his leadership, & his supreme sacrifice for the people of #Bengal. This loss is irreparable, but we stand in solidarity with his family & will extend every possible help to them to fight this situation. My heartfelt condolences to them, his friends & colleagues.(2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Grieved to know about the untimely demise of Krishna Chandra Das, who was posted as BDO Nowda in Murshidabad. A dedicated WBCS(Exe) Officer, Das was at forefront of our fight against COVID-19 & displayed great sense of sincerity & commitment in his work during the pandemic.(1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
আমার সকল মালায়ালি ভাই ও বোনেদের জানাই থিরু ওনামের শুভেচ্ছা 

Heartiest greetings to all my Malayali brothers and sisters on the occasion of Thiru Onam 

സന്തോഷകരമായ ഓണം
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering the martyrs of 1959 Khadya Andolan. In #Bengal, we provide food security to almost 10 crore people of the State, through the Khadya Sathi scheme, during this time of the pandemic. Free ration will be provided to the people till June 2021
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: ২০১৬ সালের ৩১শে আগস্ট দেশের সুপ্রিম কোর্ট, একটি ঐতিহাসিক রায় ঘোষণা করেন যে, সিঙ্গুরে বামফ্রন্ট সরকার দ্বারা জমি অধিগ্রহণ অবৈধ ছিল। সেই ঐতিহাসিক রায়ের তৃতীয় বার্ষিকীতে দেশের সব কৃষকদের আমার শুভেচ্ছা জানাই। আমরা সবসময় তাদের সংগ্রামে তাদের পাশে আছি।
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: আমার সকল আদিবাসী এবং অন্যান্য সকল সম্প্রদায়ের ভাই ও বোনেদের জানাই করম পূজার অসংখ্য শুভেচ্ছা।গত দু'বছর ধরে করম পূজা উপলক্ষে রাজ্যে সেকশনাল ছুটি দেওয়া হচ্ছে।
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
“হিন্দু না ওরা মুসলিম, ওই জিজ্ঞাসে কোন জন?
কান্ডারি বল ডুবিছে মানুষ, সন্তান মোর মার।”

বিদ্রোহী কবি কাজী নজরুল ইসলামের প্রয়াণ দিবসে জানাই শ্রদ্ধার্ঘ্য

Homage to the ‘Rebel Poet’, Kazi Nazrul Islam on his death anniversary
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Because of the ongoing pandemic and lockdown, instead of the annual #TMCPFoundationDay rally at Mayo Road, a virtual rally will be held today on @AITCofficial social media platforms. I will be addressing my dear students and activists of TMCP at 3 PM (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is #TMCPFoundationDay. Youths and students are the future of the country. They are talented, skilful, hardworking. My political struggle also began as a student activist. Future leaders of the country will emerge from among students (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
“Let us always meet each other with a smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.”
Fondly remembering Mother Teresa (Saint Teresa of Calcutta) on her birth anniversary
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Now with the directive of @EduMinOfIndia to conduct NEET, JEE 2020 in Sep, I would again appeal to the Centre to assess the risk and postpone these examinations until the situation is conducive again. It is our duty to ensure a safe environment for all our students. (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: In our last video conference with the Hon’ble PM Shri @narendramodi Ji, I had been vocal against the UGC guidelines mandating completion of terminal examinations in Universities/Colleges by the end of September 2020, which had a huge potential to put student lives at risk. (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
সকলকে জানাই গণেশ পুজোর শুভেচ্ছা
Heartiest greetings to all on the occasion of Ganesh Chaturthi
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Homage to legendary footballer Gostha Pal, on his birth anniversary
বিশিষ্ট ফুটবলার গোষ্ঠ পালের জন্মবার্ষিকীতে জানাই অন্তরের শ্রদ্ধা
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Let us always remember that Raja Ram Mohan Roy worked hard for the abolition of social ills like Sati. The Bengal Sati Regulation, 1829 provided the foundation for The Sati (Prevention) Act, 1987 passed by Indian Parliament (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Homage to social reformer Raja Ram Mohan Roy and Debendranath Tagore on Brahmo Samaj foundation day. This was a landmark event in the history of Bengal Renaissance and social reformation in the nineteenth century (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Tribute to former Prime Minister Rajiv Gandhi ji on his birth anniversary. I have fond memories of working with him.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
সকলকে জানাই কৌশিকী অমাবস্যার শুভেচ্ছা। জয় মা তারা! 
Greetings to all on the occasion of Kaushiki Amavasya. Joy Maa Tara!
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: On this day, in 1945, Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose went on a flight from Taihoku Airport in Taiwan, only to disappear forever. We still do not know what happened to him. People have a right to know about the great son of the soil
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened at the passing away of Padma Vibhushan and eminent vocalist representing the Mewati Gharana, Pandit Jasraj. His contribution to Indian classical music is immense and will always be cherished. My condolences to his family and admirers
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: পূর্ব মেদিনীপুরের এগরা কেন্দ্র থেকে নির্বাচিত বিধায়ক শ্রী সমরেশ দাসের মৃত্যুতে আমি গভীরভাবে শোকাহত। তাঁর প্রয়াণে রাজনৈতিক জগতে এক অপূরণীয় শূন্যতার সৃষ্টি হলো। তাঁর নিকটাত্মীয় ও অনুরাগীদের আন্তরিক সমবেদনা জানাই।
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
সকলকে জানাই মনসা পুজোর শুভেচ্ছা 
Greetings to all on the occasion of Manasa Pujo
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Wishing you a very happy birthday, @ArvindKejriwal. Wish you good health and happiness
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering Atal Bihari Vajpayee ji, great statesman and former PM on his death anniversary. I will always cherish the many fond memories with him
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Navroz Mubarak! Wishing all my Parsi brothers & sisters a very Happy New Year. You continue to do great service to the nation and are a wonderful example of how our country is a living example of ‘unity in diversity’
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Tribute to Sri Ramakrishna Paramhansa on his death anniversary 

শ্রী শ্রী রামকৃষ্ণ পরমহংসের তিরোধান দিবসে জানাই প্রণাম
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Happy Independence Day to all my brothers and sisters. We salute all those who sacrificed their lives to make the dream of a ‘free nation’ come true. Our freedom was hard-earned, and we must do all it takes to preserve the basic principles on which this country was founded
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Every year we observe 'Freedom At Midnight’ by hoisting the tricolour at the stroke of midnight. This year let’s do the same, but stay safe. Wear a mask and keep distance. Our great nation has overcome many challenges. This one too shall be overcome. 

Jai Hind. Bande Mataram
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is #KanyashreeDibas. The #Kanyashree scheme, started in 2013, has won the @UN (first prize) award. Nearly 67 lakh girls have been empowered through this unique scheme. Girls are assets of our nation, and we are proud of them.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is Organ Donation Day. #GoWB encourages the donation of organs after death and #Bengal is also one of the few States to have successfully created green corridors for the speedy transfer of organs. I also pledged to donate my eyes many years ago.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: We are proud of our youth. They are the future. The new generation will take our nation forward. The youth are talented, skilful, hardworking. Their dreams of today will become a reality tomorrow (3/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: When then the unemployment rate in India is at an all-time high of 24%, unemployment rate in #Bengal reduced by 40%. Youth of Bengal led the nation many times in the past and will continue to do so in the future (2/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is #InternationalYouthDay. #GoWB is committed to empowering the youth. A new scheme 'Karma Sathi Prakalpa’ was launched by #Bengal Govt. One lakh unemployed youth will be provided soft loans and subsidies to make them self-reliant. (1/3)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
বাবা লোকনাথের আবির্ভাব তিথিতে জানাই প্রণাম 

Tribute to Baba Lokenath on his Abirbhav Tithi.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Students from tribal community in our state's Ekalavya Schools have done exceedingly well in this year's Madhyamik Pariksha & Higher Secondary exams. Congratulations to all of them, their parents, teachers & well-wishers. Wishing all the students a very successful career ahead. https://t.co/P4JJrxh2FH
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
সকলকে জানাই জন্মাষ্টমীর শুভেচ্ছা ও অভিনন্দন

Heartiest greetings to all on the occasion of Janmashtami
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
হাসি হাসি পরবো ফাঁসি, দেখবে ভারতবাসী...

শহীদ ক্ষুদিরাম বসুর প্রয়াণ দিবসে শ্রদ্ধার্ঘ্য 

Tribute to Khudiram Bose on the anniversary of his martyrdom
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Concerned to hear about Former President Pranab Mukherjee Da testing positive for #COVID19. My prayers are with him & his family during this time and I wish him a speedy recovery. https://t.co/KbAvxqi7Oz
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Wishing Jharkhand Chief Minister @HemantSorenJMM Ji a very happy birthday.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is #InternationalAdivasiDay. #Bengal Govt launched Jai Johar scheme to help our brothers & sisters belonging to scheduled tribes.We have also given recognition to Ol Chiki script & Santhali language as medium. We are committed to welfare of all sections of society.Jai Johar
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: On the 78th anniversary of the Quit India Movement, my homage to all those who took part in the freedom movement. Let us not forget, the freedom struggle was the biggest ever movement ever in the history of India.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Congratulations to WBJEE candidates for getting through to the next step of your education. Continue doing well and have bright futures ahead. Always remember your teachers and guardians for the guidance they have given you
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering M Karunanidhi Ji, former chief minister of Tamil Nadu, on his death anniversary. He was a statesman and a great leader, loved by all @mkstalin @arivalayam
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Tribute to pioneering artist, and writer, Abanindranath Tagore, on his birth anniversary.

প্রথিতযশা শিল্পী ও লেখক অবনীন্দ্রনাথ ঠাকুর এর জন্মদিবসে জানাই অন্তরের শ্রদ্ধা।
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Today is Baishe Srabon, the death anniversary of Rabindranath Tagore. Homage to Gurudeb on this solemn occasion. May his life serve as a guide for us.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
জীবন মরণের সীমানা ছাড়ায়ে, বন্ধু হে আমার রয়েছ দাঁড়ায়ে...
আজ বাইশে শ্রাবণ। গুরুদেব রবীন্দ্রনাথ ঠাকুরের প্রয়াণ দিবস। বিশ্বকবিকে জানাই আমার অন্তরের প্রণাম। ওনার জীবনদর্শন আমাদের পাথেয় হয়ে উঠুক।
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened at the passing away of veteran leader, former Member of Parliament and former Bengal minister Shyamal Chakraborty. My condolences to his family, friends and supporters
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Saddened at the demise of our colleague and councillor of Ward 6, Bidhannagar Municipal Corporation, Subhash Bose. One of the many brave souls who risked his life while working in the frontline. My condolences to his family, well wishers and friends.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
হিন্দু, মুসলিম, শিখ, খ্রিস্টান
একে অপরের ভাই-ভাই!
আমার ভারত মহান,
মহান আমার হিন্দুস্তান!

আমাদের দেশ তার চিরায়ত বৈচিত্রের মধ্যে ঐক্যের ঐতিহ্যকে বহন করে চলেছে, এবং আমাদের শেষ নিঃশ্বাস পর্যন্ত ঐক্যবদ্ধভাবে এই ঐতিহ্যকে সংরক্ষিত রাখবো। (2/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Hindu Muslim Sikh Isaai 
Aapas mein hain Bhai Bhai!
Mera Bharat Mahaan,
Mahaan Hamara Hindustan.

Our country has always upheld the age-old legacy of unity in diversity, and we must preserve this to our last breath! (1/2)
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Congratulations to all successful candidates of the UPSC Civil Services Exam 2019. May you have a bright future in serving the people of our great nation. Those who didn’t qualify, try harder. With determination, you shall succeed.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Remembering the legend Kishore Kumar on his birth anniversary. His songs will forever reside in our hearts.
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Wishing everyone Happy Rakhi Bandhan. After Lord Curzon decided to divide #Bengal, Kabiguru Rabindranath Thakur started the Rakhi Bandhan tradition to give a message of unity and harmony. He also penned ‘Banglar Mati, Banglar Jol’. My best wishes to all
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: সকলকে জানাই রাখি বন্ধন উৎসবের শুভেচ্ছা। লর্ড কার্জনের বঙ্গ ভঙ্গের সিদ্ধান্তের পর, কবিগুরু রবীন্দ্রনাথ ঠাকুর রাখি বন্ধনের মাধ্যমে সম্প্রীতি ও ঐক্যের বার্তা দিয়েছিলেন। রচনা করেছিলেন 'বাংলার মাটি, বাংলার জল'। এই শুভদিন ভাল কাটুক সকলের
author: MamataOfficial

full_text: Heard about the Union Home Minister Shri @AmitShah Ji being tested positive for #COVID-19. Wishing him a speedy recovery. My prayers are with him and his family!
author: MamataOfficial

full_text:
Congratulations to @eastbengalfc & its fans for completing 100 years today. Your glorious legacy is an envy for football clubs around the world.

"১০০ বছর ধরে, মাঠ কাঁপাচ্ছে যে দল,
লাল-হলুদের ঝড়ের নাম ইস্ট বেঙ্গল"

#EastBengalClub https://t.co/vAAmcGmMqo
author: MamataOfficial
